name: Chess Platform
description:
Chess Platform is a downloable project made in python (pygame). 

Except the usual chess inteface,  Chess Platform provides you with many other features such us:

  • Create your own profile and play games using it.
  • Play custom games, by selecting your favorite color combination for the chess board and the desirable duration of the game.
  • Save the game if you want to continue it later.
  • Load saved games and delete them.
  • Match history to see all the games that have been played by all profiles.
  • Leardboard with the data of all profiles gathered in one screen, sorted by winrate.

Chess Platform is perfect for a group of people (familly,  chess team, friends) who frequently play chess and want to keep track of the games that are being played.

In order to start a new game  you have to:

  1.  Create, if not yet, 2 profiles at the page Profiles.
  2.  At the main menu click New Game.
  3.  Select 2 profiles and click NextPage.
  4.  Select a color combination for the chess board and click NextPage.
  5.  Choose the perfect duration of the game for your needs. If you want a quick game, a small B aseTime and 0 ( or small)  Increment is best for you.
  6. Click Start and have fun!

-3300+ lines of code-
